name: Relaxing Jump-Tap to down
description:
Relaxing Jump is a free ball game, highly addictive and easy to get the hang of.
Experience a new relaxing way of falling from the top, feel the great pleasure it brings you!

Relaxing Jump is an exciting free game that helps you relieve daily stress through falling down at a high speed.

Features
>Fun & addictive ball game with one-touch control
>The deeper you reach, the more interesting monster characters you will unlock
>Beautiful tower and lovely monsters
>Special Halloween levels are waiting for you
>Collect coins to buy more special characters
>Best free game that suits all ages
>Hurry up, come feel this free speed falling game

Contact Us:
Let us know if you like our game or have some thoughts on our game! We’d love to hear your precious advice and suggestion. You may contact us at:
